titleStmt.title: Parliamentum pacificum, or, The happy union of King & people in an healing Parliament heartily wish't for, and humbly recommended / by a true Protestant and no dissenter.
titleStmt.author: Northleigh, John, 1657-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by M. Turner ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Northleigh. cf. BM.
